channel.title: Hmmmm
channel.description: Hi I was wondering if someone is capable of doing the samething "Durial 32 1 did or something similar..Just wonering cause I would love for that to happen(just the chaos and everyone screaming Gets me Hype!) and I would hate for something like that to happen(people would loose there precious Item's) So Start Flaming meh! and let the noob caling begin! .. Ancient Weed

item.title: Hmmmm
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Something similar has happened to me before, but I couldn’t attack others. While I was fighting in wildy I teled out and I had the options Attack/Trade/Follow but I couldn’t attack anyone. It said they are not in the wilderness, just what it says
when you click on someone who is outside wildy.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmmmm
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

oh, 19 days, that would of killed me, (when i loved runescape to bits and played for 37 hours 32 minutes constanly (exept toilet breaks)
And lots of coffee…

mmmmmmmmhhhhh aaahhhh
the good old days…

Read full topic

I played since the yo-yo came out like 3 years ago…

item.title: Hmmmm
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

lol, Kloplop321 got banned, they had no proof, and for the final chance thing, they even denied it for the wrong reason, saying i have broke the rules time, and time again, I have played for 2 years and got banned for telling someone I farted, which I dunno why they reported me. my total lvl was over 1080

Read full topic

item.title: Hmmmm
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:8, topic:73687”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=108235.msg1083536#msg1083536 date=1175582619]
They have a program designed to detect people fighting out side of wild now, wonder how they found that guy in under 10mins?
They knew he had it the moment he got the ability.
[/quote]

He was fighting for at least an hour.[/quote]
Your thinking of somebody else, I mean a guy teled out of wild and was still able to attack people-
10minutes later he was disconnected and the bug was fixed.

Ancient weed:

jagex is a bitch…please dont ask y…

They are…
They banned my account, Exe626 over half a year ago.
Took them 5 months to respond to a Final Chance Query to tell me ‘Fuck off, you can’t play no more’
Then when I complain about it through that account, they tell me-
‘Thanks for the compliment on our services, we love to hear from you,
Please sign up for Member-ship to have more features and support our game’
Or something like that, and I say a bunch of bull shit.
And they want me to make a perm banned account a member?
What the fuck is their problem.

Read full topic

why? lol, just jocking, anyway, do you think there is a way to intercept a transfer of the new server firmware(you know of Real Runescape) in internet transfer, or do they fly little planes to each server machine and stick in a CD ?

item.title: Hmmmm

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

It was an unplanned chain of events that lead to people being able to kill other people. Same with the dupe and other big bugs. It will be along time before some fucker gets lucky and able to own runescape again.

item.title: Hmmmm
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Asking to be flamed won’t get you nowhere.
About a month ago there was a guy who got bugged teleing from wild and had the ability to attack other players, it was taken care of in under 10mins…
I don’t think those bugs will work anymore.

Read full topic
